title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Raw Ground Turkey Products Linked to Salmonella Hadar Illness
summary: Editor’s notes: On April 12, The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) issued a food safety alert for the Salmonella Hadar outbreak linked to ground turkey. This public health alert was updated on April 12, 2021 to reflect the recent change made by the...
